citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany inspection at (11-20-2014 2:30 pm )
Contact me Jerry West at 240-461-9185 with a time when someone will normally be available for inspection.
